locations.name: Marina's Bedroom
locations.description: Bedroom in a wooden stilted house near the waterfront in Tumaco. Wooden plank walls, full bed with white mosquito net draped overhead. Wooden nightstand with battery-powered lamp (power is unreliable). Hooks on wall for headwraps and clothes. Small wooden dresser. Window with wooden shutters (no glass) letting in ocean breeze. Sound of waves at night. Small religious image of Virgen del Carmen (patron saint of fishermen) on wall. Standing fan (when power works). Woven mat on wooden floor.
key_features: full bed with white mosquito net
Virgen del Carmen image on wall

lighting_conditions.pre_dawn: dark, battery lamp glow, faint moonlight through shutters
lighting_conditions.morning: warm tropical light through open shutters, ocean light
lighting_conditions.evening: battery lamp glow, dim warm light, moonlight on water visible through window

variations: wide shot showing bed and mosquito net
bed and window with ocean view
dresser and Virgen del Carmen image

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, simple wooden bedroom in stilted house, wooden plank walls, full bed with white mosquito net draped overhead, wooden nightstand with battery lamp, hooks on wall with colorful headwraps, small wooden dresser, window with wooden shutters open to ocean breeze, Virgen del Carmen image on wall, woven mat on wooden floor, standing fan, tropical Pacific coast bedroom, Tumaco Colombia, humble but warm
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, modern bedroom, luxury, urban apartment, carpet, large room, glass windows, air conditioning

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain wooden stilted house feel with Pacific coast atmosphere

locations.name: Marina's Bathroom
locations.description: Simple bathroom in wooden stilted house. Corrugated metal shower stall with rain shower head (water from roof tank). Plastic bucket for water backup when tank is low. Single concrete sink. Small mirror on wall. Bar of soap on shelf. Simple towel hanging on nail. Rubber boots (botas pantaneras) left outside the door. Wooden floor with drainage gaps between planks.

lighting_conditions.pre_dawn: dark, single bare bulb (if power works), or battery lamp light
lighting_conditions.morning: natural light from gaps in walls and ceiling
lighting_conditions.evening: single bare bulb or lamp light

variations: view toward shower stall and bucket

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, simple bathroom in wooden stilted house, corrugated metal shower stall, rain shower head, plastic water bucket, single concrete sink, small mirror, bar of soap, towel on nail, wooden plank floor with drainage gaps, rubber boots outside door, humble tropical bathroom, Pacific coast Colombia, Tumaco
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, modern bathroom, tile, marble, bathtub, luxury, glass shower, urban apartment

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain simple wooden house bathroom feel, not modern or urban

locations.name: Marina's Fishing Boat and Pacific Coast
locations.description: Marina's small wooden motorboat (lancha) moored at a wooden dock in Tumaco. The boat has an outboard motor, fishing nets of different mesh sizes, a plastic cooler for the catch, rope coils, a bait bucket, a gasoline can, wooden oars as backup, and an orange life vest. The Pacific Ocean stretches out with gray-green water. Mangrove trees line the shore. Other fishing boats bob nearby. Pelicans circle overhead. Early morning fog often hangs over the water. The wooden dock has mooring posts and weathered planks.

lighting_conditions.pre_dawn: dark sky, stars fading, first gray light on horizon, fog on water
lighting_conditions.early_morning: golden dawn light breaking through fog, water reflecting pink and gold
lighting_conditions.morning: bright tropical sun, sparkling water, clear visibility
lighting_conditions.midday: harsh overhead sun, bright glare on water

variations: boat at dock with gear visible
boat on open water with nets
dock scene with mangroves and other boats

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, small wooden fishing boat (lancha) at wooden dock, outboard motor, fishing nets, plastic cooler, rope coils, bait bucket, Pacific Ocean gray-green water, mangrove trees along shore, other fishing boats, pelicans overhead, early morning fog, tropical coastal fishing scene, Tumaco Colombia Pacific coast, weathered wooden dock with mooring posts

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain Pacific coast Colombian fishing village atmosphere with mangroves and gray-green water

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location with slight angle variations. Focus on capturing Pacific coast Colombian fishing village aesthetic with wooden stilted architecture and mangrove coastline.

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Capture authentic Afro-Colombian Pacific coast fishing village aesthetic
notes.cultural_elements: Wooden stilted houses, fishing boats (lanchas), mangrove coastline, Virgen del Carmen devotion, colorful headwraps, Pacific Ocean gray-green water
notes.character_home_style: Coastal, traditional, humble stilted wooden house, working fishing family
